name: A Neon Police Escape Chase Future Sprint Smash Battle Pro Version HD
name_original: A Neon Police Escape Chase Future Sprint Smash Battle Pro Version HD
description:
*** GAME DOES NOT CONTAIN ADS ***

Are you ready to race at super speeds using Rockets, Armor and huge speed boosts? Test your Racing skills in Neon Police Escape Year 2097 is the latest action racing game for adrenaline junkies set in the not to distant future!

Tilt your device to dodge the traffic as you speed through the futuristic streets of 2097. Tap on Rockets and other special Powers to smash your way through and stay alive!

Download NOW and put your skills to the test.
- Simple tilt and tap game controls
- Amazing 3D graphics
- Randomized and Auto-generated traffic makes a new experience every time!
- Choose from many upgrades such as rockets, shields, power boosts and anti-magnets
- Epic dubstep sound track to really get you pumping!
- Compete with your friends scores on game center

Do you have what it takes to be the king of Neon Police Escape?
